name: Substrate has no damages and sound
Floor grinded or free from any latent, contaminants or cracks
Floor level surveyed and prep to acceptable substrate finish height
Setting out tiles according to construction drawing / Site confirmation
Full coverage of tiles with adhesive
Tile lippiness checked and to acceptable standard
Finishing trims & transition bars edge alignment
Tiles adhesive cured and cleaned properly
Grout work properly into all joint
Silicon applied and installed to a neat continuously finish
